verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*, \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

And Jehoash was seven years old when he became king.
